name: Warm Berry Ricotta Hotcakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine berries, icing sugar and juice into a saucepan. Stir over low heat until sugar is dissolved and berries are warm.

Lightly whisk eggs, sugar and vanilla in a bowl. Stir in milk. Place flour into a bowl and make a well in the centre. Pour milk mixture into well and stir, gradually drawing the flour into the mixture until combined. Crumble ricotta over.

Heat a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. add a knob of butter. When sizzling, spoon 1/3 cup of batter into the pan. Cook, turning when bubbles appear on surface, for 2-3 minutes each side until golden. Remove from pan. Cover to keep warm. repeat with remaining batter to make 12 hotcakes. Stack hotcakes on a plate and spoon over warm berries. Serve.
